item.title: Bibliography
item.description: Some of these bibliographies I’ve been reading for my research and some I find it interesting to keep around my library. Operating Systems # Introductory # Modern Operating Systems # Bibtex @book{tanenbaum2014ModenOS, author = {Tanenbaum, Andrew S. and Bos, Herbert}, title = {Modern Operating Systems}, year = 2014, isbn = {013359162X}, publisher = {Prentice Hall Press}, address = {USA}, edition = {4th}, abstract = { Modern Operating Systems, Fourth Edition, is intended for introductory courses in Operating Systems in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, and Electrical Engineering programs.
